Does this comment use all-caps function to express SHOUTING?
Instruction: Code Yes (1) when one or more words are capitalized to express SHOUTING. Exclamation mark at the end can signal shouting.
Example 1 (Code as Yes (1)): ‘YOU PEOPLE ALL HAVE BIGGER ISSUES . LOOK IN THE MIRROR YOUR NO (0)T PERFECT..NO (0) ONE IS. LET'S STOP BEING HYPOCRITES.. ‘
Example 2 (Code as Yes (1)): ’What's f*cking next? Someone orders a Coke instead of a Pepsi? SODA-GATE!’
Example 3 (Code as Yes (1)): ‘Not our responsibility to take care of ILLEGALS abusing the asylum system.’
Exception: Code No (0) when the comment involves all-caps function not meant for shouting (e.g. when some words are capitalized for acronyms or abbreviations, like MAGA).\n\nRespond with only the predicted class (0 or 1) of the request.\n\nText: {text}\nClass:
